Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I may not be where I want to be, but thank God I am not where I used to be

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: God's mercy is fresh and new every morning

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no happier person than a truly thankful, content person

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Integrity means that you are the same in public as you are in private

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't just let the devil use your mind as a garbage dump

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: Valentine's Day is definitely one of those days where it's either awesome or it's a downer

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't consider lacrosse a sport. To me that's just a frat activity that got out of hand

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually banned from the Himalayas, because I'm too good at yoga

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: I never got into things to be famous. Sometimes it's fun, sometimes it's annoying

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: In Manhattan, I often do two or three or more shows a night, so I'm always working on new material

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really planned on doing a television series

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an extra dark black belt in ping pong

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: My act's not heavy on pop culture or stories, just lots of jokes

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up is kind of like my home base, and doing stand-up in New York is what I like doing most

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: We're supposed to be uncomfortable when we read something. That's how we learn

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: Life goes on if you're one of the lucky ones

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an e-mail junkie though I'm trying to read my in-box only twice a day and to answer all at once

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: A good writer is always a people watcher

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people who write for kids, we have that ability to go back into our own lives

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to write what I remembered to be true

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not just the books under fire now that worry me. It is the books that will never be written

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to watch movies

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who thinks my life is cupcakes is all wrong

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was young, my parents had a library in our living room. I was always free to browse and read

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: The sea is only the embodiment of a supernatural and wonderful existence

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: Though sleep is called our best friend, it is a friend who often keeps us waiting!

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: Solitude, isolation, are painful things and beyond human endurance

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: When one has taken root, one puts out branches

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: We may brave human laws, but we cannot resist natural ones

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: A man of merit owes himself to the homage of the rest of mankind who recognize his worth

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: With happiness as with health: to enjoy it, one should be deprived of it occasionally

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: Trains, like time and tide, stop for no one

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: I have noticed that many who do not believe in God believe in everything else, even in the evil eye

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty is worth paying for

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a good right hook

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people regard discipline as a chore. For me, it is a kind of order that sets me free to fly

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: Broadway is a tough, tough arena for singing

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an optimistic lady

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: I love singing, and I came to absolutely adore it in the later part of my career

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: I would be a fool to deny my own abilities

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: The thrill of being in front of a camera remains exactly the same

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I'm so sweet even I can't stand it

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: It has been said that a pretty face is a passport. But it's not, it's a visa, and it runs out fast

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: People - and I include myself - get fat because they choose pleasure over self-denial

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Gluttony and idleness are two of life's great joys, but they are not honourable

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: But just think what a boring, bread-and-milk world this would be without the boastful

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Shame, like beauty, is often in the eye of the beholder

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a spiritual bone in my body; but what I am, is religious

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't know how to fool a man any more. My deceiving days seem so long ago

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me a frigid women and, nine times out of ten, I'll show you a little man

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: A good part - and definitely the most fun part - of being a feminist is about frightening men

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: I just have a real problem with people who seek to portray fatness or thinness as moral concepts

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is the teacher of all things

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: I came, I saw, I conquered

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: As a rule, men worry more about what they can't see than about what they can

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: Men in general are quick to believe that which they wish to be true

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: Which death is preferably to every other? 'The unexpected'

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: In war, events of importance are the result of trivial causes

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not these well-fed long-haired men that I fear, but the pale and the hungry-looking

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I look most like myself... when I'm wearing my black, nerdy engineering glasses

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: God bless perseverance. Because it's not easy

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody warned me that when you fall in love, you really fall in love forever

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Colleagues are a wonderful thing - but mentors, that's where the real work gets done

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I have three storage units, and that's no lie. Three storage units. All books

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Infidelity raises profound questions about intimacy

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a product of a fragmented world

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a chatty person, but colossally discreet

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love 'The Autobiography of Malcolm X.' That was like the only black book we read in high school

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: To an outsider, I just seem like a list of accomplishments. To me, all there is is how often I fail

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm crazy, I'm nuts. Just the way my brain works. I'm not normal. I think differently

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I make mistakes growing up. I'm not perfect; I'm not a robot

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can stop me

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I want my world to be fun

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy with the man I'm becoming

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I leave the hip thrusts to Michael Jackson

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: My mind is always racing

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really an animal guy. I express myself in different ways as an animal

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a bright future ahead of me

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent doesn't always equal success

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel very fortunate to be compared to somebody so incredible. Michael Jackson's an icon

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: As time goes by people will see who I am for who I am

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: Every relationship I've been in, I've overwhelmed the girl. They just can't handle all the love

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time you do a project, you learn something new

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip is called gossip because it's not always the truth

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe people can move things with their minds

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: I like simple things. I like to sneak in the theatre and watch movies. I'm a movie buff

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to play golf. I like to shoot hoops

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: I sang in church growing up. Memphis is the blues capital of the world, we like to say

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada has always been there to help people who need it

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: Who cares about winning? We should focus on serving

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: Ours was not a normal or easy life

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: At one point, people are going to have to realize that maybe I know what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: Living your life in the public eye is a greater burden than most people can imagine

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: My father raised us to step toward trouble rather than to step away from it

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: We're asking those who have done well to do a little more for the people who need it

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: Our child benefit goes directly to the families who need it the most

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we're pretty much where we need to be on corporate taxes

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody who has political ambition has an Achilles heel

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the level of devotion some sci-fi fans display turns other people off

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: I was convinced that I was going to be onstage for the rest of my life

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't want to diminish anybody's pain and suffering

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: Jane Austen is very amusing

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: You're always concerned for your character. You should be

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: When somebody says, 'Action,' I act. When they say, 'Cut,' that's my job. I've done it

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: Jokes are very curious things psychologically

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: You can go lots of places as Gaius Baltar that other people aren't allowed to pursue

Quote.Author: James Callis
Quote.QuoteValue: My first show, in England, was called 'Soldier, Soldier.'

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a fever, in poetry: a fever, and tranquillity

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: The true feeling of sex is that of a deep intimacy, but above all of a deep complicity

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: A poet is someone who stands outside in the rain hoping to be struck by lightning

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: To be precise and reckless: that is the consummation devoutly to be wished

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: He can't imagine the result of the mission because he never saw it

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: I want you all to stand; will you do that for me, please?

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: You are bound, my hunch is, to make it just fine

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: She was the Judy Garland of American poetry

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: There ain't nothin' to dyin', really. You just get tired. You kind of drift away

Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: I want you to hear a new version of Dueling Banjos. Anyone else is welcome

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not consider my self as having mastered the flute, but I get a real kick out of trying

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: It is normal to be nervous

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: Being unprepared heightens nerves

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: You can sightread better if you know your scales and arpeggios

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes indeed I have gained a lot out of playing scales and etudes

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone who plays the flute should learn singing

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot prepare enough for anything

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: Control of vibrato helps your musical expression

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not see scales as abstract

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: Scales played in the correct musical way are very exciting and rewarding

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: All I can do is put on my armor and brace for the arrows

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to have some of my voice because I have my own experiences that I lived through

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to be a wounded leading man. Instead of a pillar of strength, I'd be the scared one

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really kind of a vampire at heart

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the millenium, motives are incidental

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: There are certain rules one must abide by in order to succesfully survive a horror movie

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: People want to hear the gossip. They don't want to hear about the shots

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: If you were the only suspect in a senseless bloodbath, would you be standing the the horror section?

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I like doing interviews. I really do

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I think anybody can be a good actor

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: I just loved and love life. I love it today

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was the dearest, sweetest angel. She didn't talk; she sang. She was a tower of strength

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: The best people I know have had a lot of obstacles to overcome

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one secret. To love what you are doing

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: I never look at a note. I just roam the stage. The people do not want to leave

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage, even the best marriages are tough

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: Steve is very quiet, even shy. I am very gregarious. So, opposites

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: I was fed up with being just plain Jane

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: I have this tremendous energy. I just loved and love life. I love it today. I never want to die

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: I never say a funny thing intentionally

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: Old music is the same as new music - it's just a different way of delivering it

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is my first love

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: Live shows are fun - sometimes. But you have to practice for months on end

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day I have to please myself. And I've made a record to please myself

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: I just realized how long it was since the last album, and where did the time go? You know?

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: As you get older, the days have gone, and the years have gone, and it's 'whoosh!'

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: The hairs stand up on the back of my neck at certain music

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still getting thrilled with music even after 40 years of doing it professionally

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, making records isn't work

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: The first band I saw were Mike Sheridan and The Nightriders, in their brown mohair suits, in 1966

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Shrek is not like anything anybody has ever seen before

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very difficult time getting the Napster world

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't got a lot of patience

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Inspiration comes from all different places

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what we do really well - I just try and keep us focused on doing that

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You can tell when an actor or actress cares about their work. It's really clear

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The entire exhibitions industry in the United States of America has filed for bankruptcy

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: It was the business that made Pop go away, not our inability to create

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Since we made Shrek in the digital format, you actually can see it in its purest form digitally

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing that's changed the most has just been the rapid technology

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: San Francisco. The one team that everyone in LA hates

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: It's different hearing girls I don't even know scream my name

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to have a bunch of kids so I can boss them around

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely want to do movies and stuff

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies are great, TV is great

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: I get recognized a lot now. It's great

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought I was the coolest kid in the world, so I wound up being the coolest kid in the world

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: My memory's bad!

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the scary part about TV, how you'll feel about it in six years

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been accused of making people laugh, maybe when it's not appropriate, during scenes

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: College was especially sweet because of the positive, hopeful atmosphere of a college campus

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: Normally, if you go through a game without attracting attention, you are doing a hell of a job

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: When the game is over it is really just beginning

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life has been one of seeking experience

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: In November, 1964 when I was a patient at the Mayo Clinic I though seriously about killing myself

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: To have that kind of ovation, that happens very seldom for a lineman

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole book experience was a look into another world, the world of Gore Vidal and Norman Mailer

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: Probably the best part of my life has been watching the kids play their games

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a great deal of love for one another on this club. Perhaps we're living in Camelot

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: We will pay any price that we are instructed to. But the money has to come from somewhere

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Creative comedy is like growing geraniums in a mine field

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Never go for the punch line. There might be something funnier on the way

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood never knew there was a Vietnam War until they made the movie

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been around the block a lot and I've had a merry trail for 55 years

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think my judgment is that good. I don't know what is funny

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: I shave without using shaving cream

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is sensual

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Being on a sitcom stops me from getting Alzheimer's

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved the idea of touching base with an audience

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing in this business is to be thought of as a no-talent

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: If I stopped writing and being at my piano, I wouldn't know how to live. It's your best friend

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: In our depths, I think we all feel very small in relation to the greater universe and God

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd always been on the giving end of music and creating

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very happy. I was little scared because it's such a big bite

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: It's just what it is. It just all happened in my stride

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: It's part of what I do at my piano - the hymns. And then I write

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: Mother was a great force in her area of evangelism

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is important

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: There's just no vision. You have no ground, no vision

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: What I felt is the same kind of love I felt between Waylon and his audience. And that's what I miss

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child's eye - it is very beautiful

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: India may be a land of over a 100 problems, but it is also a place for a billion solutions

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: Every single minute matters, every single child matters, every single childhood matters

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: Each time I free a child, I feel it is something closer to God

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: I never go to temples, but when I see a child, I see God in them

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, peace is a fundamental human right of every child; it is inevitable and divine

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us unite the world through the compassion for our children

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest challenge or biggest crisis knocking on the doors of humankind is fear and intolerance

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: We still have a soft approach on the perpetrators of crimes like worst forms of child labour

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to accept that the shackles of slavery can ever be stronger than the quest for freedom

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the fashion world. I love clothes. I love style

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I love animals, and I feel more of a connection to animals than people

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: Obviously, I don't have a high IQ, but I've always liked nerds and quirky guys

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I really am an open book. I don't keep anything in at all, which is good and bad

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a country girl at heart

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most competitive person you'll ever meet

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: James Garner is like a peaceful river through our chaos

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all music. Right now I am loving Josh Grobin and Kelly Clarkson

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: You do a job; your show gets canceled. You get used to it

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Big Bang' is unbelievable; I'm blessed, but it's not the only thing in my life

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been very determined. I don't get easily discouraged

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen to the sounds of nature. Wishing you the best on your trek towards your dreams

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: The journey matters as much as the goal

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: Take good care of our fragile planet

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: You are just your intelligence

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: Material interests are not the only guiding light

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: The quickest way may not necessarily be the best

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to do something, what does it matter where you are ranked?

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: I am from Karnal, India

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: You must enjoy the journey because whether or not you get there, you must have fun on the way

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised to be an independent woman, not the victim of anything

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: What we all want is public safety. We don't want rhetoric that's framed through ideology

Quote.Author: Kamala Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: The American dream belongs to all of us
